title: Activation "beep" not occurring after saying "okay Google" on Pixel 4 xl
content:
Had a 30 min troubleshoot session  via online chat with Google support. Tried Okay Open Settings > Accessibility > slide ON Switch Access > tap on Allow > tap on Exit --- which didn't work.
Deleted assistant cache and storage and reinstalled updates, which didn't work either.
Activating downloaded services in the Accessibility settings didn't work.

Restarting the phone didn't help.

Phone is up to date with all software.

Any solutions?
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 4 XL
